Title: The Hustle
Writer: Stanley Shapiro (screenplay by), Paul Henning (screenplay by), Dale Launer (screenplay by), Jac Schaeffer (screenplay by), Stanley Shapiro (story by), Paul Henning (story by), Dale Launer (story by)
Actors: Timothy Simons, Rebel Wilson, Douggie McMeekin, Ashley McGuire
Plot: Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson star as female scam artists, one low rent and the other high class, who team up to take down the men who have wronged them.
